siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt: There is no limit for the amount of _when_ cases each notification may have but there is an overall limit for the amount of _when_ cases each server in a workspace may have. It depends on your current plan.
markdownRemark.html:
There is no limit for the amount of when cases each notification may have but there is an overall limit for the amount of when cases each server in a workspace may have. It depends on your current plan.

Please visit the pricing page for plan details: Price

frontmatter.title: How many when cases notifications may I have?
How to change “wait before firing again” value for all notifications at once?
Can I turn on/off the notification for a single when case?
